com.enaikoon.android.service.opencellid.upload.data

Class UploadConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.enaikoon.android.service.opencellid.upload.data.UploadConstants

  • public class UploadConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    Public definitions of ACTIONS, EXTRAS_KEYS, PREFKEYS and default values for global settings broadcast changes.
    Author:
    Danijel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CONFIGURATION_ACTION
      Action for sending broadcast configuration
      static long NEW_DATA_CHECK_INTERVAL_LONG_DEFAULT
      Default value for periodic database checks for new data - 30 seconds.
      static java.lang.String OPEN_CELL_DEFAULT_UPLOAD_URL
      Default upload URL for OpenCellId servers.
      static java.lang.String OPENCELL_NETWORKS_UPLOAD_URL
      Default upload URL for networks on OpenCellId servers.
      static java.lang.String PREF_API_KEY
      Configuration key for reading a public key for sending measurements to opencellid database
      static java.lang.String PREF_NEW_DATA_CHECK_INTERVAL_KEY
      Configuration key used to read interval in ms for new data checks.
      static java.lang.String PREF_ONLY_WIFI_UPLOAD_KEY
      Configuration key to check if only WiFi network will be used to upload data.
      static java.lang.String PREF_OPENCELL_NETWORK_UPLOAD_URL_KEY
      Used to set network upload URL.
      static java.lang.String PREF_OPENCELL_UPLOAD_URL_KEY
      Configuration key used to read upload URL for OpenCellID servers.
